n_operators.description: Number of call operator staff on duty (1-100)

n_nurses.description: Number of nurse staff on duty (1-50)

mean_iat.description:
Mean inter-arrival time in minutes (average time between arrivals). Baseline = 0.6 min.

Demand changes:
1. Percentage change form: If demand increases by fraction X, set mean_iat = baseline × (1 - X). If demand decreases by fraction X, set mean_iat = baseline × (1 + X).
2. Multiplicative change form: If arrivals are multiplied by factor M (e.g., 'half the calls' = M=0.5, 'double the calls' = M=2), set mean_iat = baseline × (1 / M).

nurse_consult_low.description: Low bound for nurse consult duration (minutes)

nurse_consult_high.description: High bound for nurse consult duration (minutes)
